fields.headline: The year's hottest tune - already
fields.bodyText: Radio has been hammering it for a while.... finally a copy turned up in the office. 'Crazy'. Gnarls Barkley -- aka Dangermouse (yer Gorillaz man, whose album with Jemini two years ago was also an absolute peach) plus CeeLo. The kind of record that makes you weep tears of pure joy. Think 'Crazy In Love' or 'Hey Ya' (with shades of 'Killer', to these ears at least). What's more, we've got the whole album. It's not due out until May, but I'll say now that's it's going to storm the end-of-year polls. Time to spin it again...
